item.title: News Command Error, Please Help
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

ok guys i tried adding a ::news command and i compiled and everything i got no errors, but when i try to do the command i get kicked out and in my CMD i get a error. first of all to get ::news i just copied this code

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("rules") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@BmwScape -Rules", 8144); //Title sendQuest("u cannot trade real items,for BmwScape)", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dre@Player Rules", 8148); sendQuest("Ask For Mod Warning,Ask Twice Mute,No 1 Iteming!", 8149); sendQuest("Respect The Staff,If You Do They Will Respect You!", 8150); sendQuest("Duping Is Ip-Ban,No Trading Rs Accounts That Is A Mute!", 8151); sendQuest("Farcasting Is Aloud,Looting And Pjing Is Jail!", 8152); sendQuest("@whi@Staff Rules", 8153); sendQuest("No Abusing, If You Abuse You Will Be Demoted", 8154); sendQuest("If You Jailed,Muted,Banned,Ip-Banned For No Reason", 8155); sendQuest("Then You Will Be Demoted!", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("Thank You For Reading Rules!", 8158); sendQuest(" @whi@Bmw", 8159); sendQuest("", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Read Rules Good!"); }

And i pasted that again changint it to

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("news") && (playerRights >= 0)) { String name = command.substring(5); sendQuest("@dre@BmwScape -News", 8144); //Title sendQuest("~Updated After Each Update~", 8145); clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Clan Wars Added ::clanwars", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); sendQuest("", 8151); sendQuest("", 8152); sendQuest("", 8153); sendQuest("", 8154); sendQuest("", 8155); sendQuest("", 8156); sendQuest("", 8157); sendQuest("More Soon!", 8158); sendQuest("", 8159); sendQuest("", 8162); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); sM("Enjoy The Updates!"); }

and this is the error i get when i try to do the command in game

[size=7]PLEASE HELP[/size]

Read full topic
